content.prompt: Leilani prefers to maintain an exciting life with lots of people around and lots of activities all the time. She went on a retreat where she encountered a much quieter environment than she is used to. When she returned home, she immediately sought out friends and went to a concert. Which of the following theories best explains her behavior when she returned home?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
